title: Bug 134949 - Themes nesting in another library
description:
Bug 134949 - Themes nest in other library
Details: Themes nest in other library
Step: 1.
OB: When I open the Library tree of A in the library explorer and drop the themes from B into the layout, it results in an error message stating that the library namespace 'B' already exists.
EB: The expected behavior is that dropping themes from Library B into the layout of Library A should not trigger an error related to existing library namespaces. The operation should be allowed without any issues.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Ensure Library A is using Library B, and Library B has a theme.
2. Design a report using Library A.
3. Open the Library tree of A in the library explorer.
4. Drop the themes from Library B into the layout.

Actual result: An error message pops up, indicating that the library namespace 'B' already exists.

Exception result: It is unclear whether I can proceed with this method due to the error.
